image.title: NEET Photo Resizer - Resize to 200x300 px & 10KB JPEG
image.description: Free NEET photo resizer tool to convert your image to 200x300 pixels and under 200KB JPEG, as required by NTA NEET 2025. Quick, secure, and works on mobile
featureList: 📸 Upload photo or signature from any device
📐 Resize image to exact NEET specifications
🧠 Smart detection for photo vs signature
📁 Convert to required formats like JPG or JPEG
🔍 Instant preview before and after resizing
